quizPage.title: Congratulations, you can participate in a new promotion from Samsung!
quizPage.textSelling: Samsung is selling their new popular galaxy ring model for
texts: Das südkoreanische Unternehmen Samsung baut seine Marktpräsenz in Deutschland aus, indem es eine zweite Produktionslinie in Betrieb nimmt und das Wachstum ankurbelt. Mit dieser Expansion will Samsung seinen Marktanteil auf 65 % erhöhen und verkauft in einem ersten Schritt 1.500 Ringe in Deutschland zu einem Preis von 2€ speziell für die neue Produkteinführung.

quiz.question: What characteristics of the ring are important to you?
How did you find out about the Galaxy ring?

features.name: Sleek Titanium Finish
features.text: Stay ahead of the trends with an all new Galaxy that proves high-tech devices don't have to be bulky. The durable titanium frame keeps the Galaxy Ring looking beautiful throughout all your day's activities.

features.name: Detailed insights
features.text: With Galaxy Ring, your everyday movements go much further. Using the power of Galaxy AI, it works out where you can improve by constantly analysing your wellness habits, sleep quality and heart rate to build a comprehensive picture of your wellness.

features.name: Wireless Charging Cradle
features.text: The Charging Case has a light around the Multi-purpose button that indicates the battery charging level. You can also charge the Charging Case wirelessly, so simply place Galaxy Ring in its case, and place it on a wireless charging pad for easy charging.

features.name: Durable And Water-resistant
features.text: Tough enough to handle the everyday and a whole lot more, including up to 100m water resistance. Whether you’re swimming or sweating, Galaxy Ring can handle it.

features.name: Energy Score
features.text: Discover how ready you are to tackle your day with the power of AI. Your sleep, heart rate and previous activity is factored into the overall score to help you decide on your activity levels. Whether it’s lace up or rest up, Galaxy Ring’s AI-boosted intelligence will give you the answer.

features.name: Wellness Tips
features.text: Enjoy precise, AI-tailored motivational messages and training tips based on your activity with your very own personal coach – every day.

features.name: Cycle Tracking
features.text: Uncover more detail in your menstrual cycle, with skin temperature analysis to help predict your next fertile window and plan your life on your own terms.

features.name: Sleep Insights
features.text: Galaxy Ring and Samsung Health together monitor your overall sleep to provide sleep insights. Get Sleep Coaching based on your sleep data to improve your sleep habits.
